Hi Noah,

I have a requirement in which I want to provide Chrome user agent=
.

I can change the user agent using the below bean property
<property name=
=3D"userAgentTemplate" 
         value=3D"Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix=
/@VERSION@ +@OPERATOR_CONTACT_URL@)"/> 

The problem is that it takes the o=
perator contact url, but my requirement is that I do not want to specify th=
e operator contact url.

Can this be possible?
If yes how?

Thanks in advan=
ce.


Regards,
Nikhil
